title: More Tales From the Island of California
description: More Tales from the Island of California continues the tradition of fairy-tale-like stories from Catherine Weaver, blending magic with realistic details of present-day life to present a picture of the world as an amazing place, where anything can happen. In this volume you will find dragons, centaurs, griffins, an Amazon queen, and others in original and believable tales with delightfully unexpected endings.
author: Catherine  Weaver
